You Only Have to Double Jump

君(きみ)は(は)ただ(ただ)二(に)回(かい)飛(と)べば(べば)いい(いい)kimi wa tada nikai tobeba ii

"Go! KakedashiYuusya"

"Take your feet and go forth."
L

The story of the hero Kakedashi Yuusha.

Lyrics

Versions

  • Original: The original version of the song uploaded to niconico and YouTube on June 6, 2018, and later featured on "#Compass Battle Providence Analysis System" Original Soundtrack VOL.02 and EVILS EXTRA.

Albums

Notes

  • The PV was illustrated by Hidekazu.
  • This song was originally composed as a theme for the character Kakedashi in the game Compass Battle Feed Proprietary Analysis System.
  • The song was paired up with Fictional Masquerade in supplementary material for EVILS EXTRA.
